traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) Acid damage.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.trigger: While the jelly is Large or Medium and has 10+ Hit Points, it becomes Bloodied or is subjected to Lightning or Slashing damage.
reactions.response: The jelly splits into two new Ochre Jellies. Each new jelly is one size smaller than the original jelly and acts on its Initiative. The original jellyâ€™s Hit Points are divided evenly between the new jellies (round down).
